blueprint.description: Installs Quasar (a Remote Administration Tool) on Windows 10
blueprint.overview: [Quasar](https://github.com/quasar/Quasar) is a fast and light-weight remote administration tool coded in C#. The usage ranges from user support through day-to-day administrative work to employee monitoring. Providing high stability and an easy-to-use user interface, Quasar is the perfect remote administration solution for you.
blueprint.name: Quasar
blueprint.title: Quasar
